brief: Set multiple parameters of the reverb.
name: set()
description: Set multiple parameters of the reverb. Parameters have to be in the right order.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: A value controlling the room size of the effect

parameters.name: damp
parameters.description: A value controlling the damping factor of the reverb

parameters.name: wet
parameters.description: A value controlling the wet/dry ratio of the reverb.
